Class StreamSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jrouteros.core.StreamSender

  • public class StreamSender
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    janisk

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer protocolLengthEncoder(java.lang.String command)
      This method will returned length of command sentence that will used as a standard protocol in MiroTik RouterOS
      byte[] protocolStreamEncoder(java.lang.String command)
      This method will returned concatenation of protocolLengthEncoder(String) and protocolWordEncoder(String) that will send to MikroTik RouterOS
      byte[] protocolWordEncoder(java.lang.String command)
      This method will returned byte array of command sentence that will used as a standard protocol in MiroTik RouterOS
      boolean sendStream(java.lang.String command)
      This method used for sending data to MikroTik RouterOS If sending data is successful it will return true otherwise it will return false
